channel.description: Create the EKS Cluster Configuration We will use eksctl to build the cluster. The best practice is to define the cluster in a configuration file, which you can then commit to your Git repository for version control and reproducibility. In the root of your project directory, create a new folder named k8s. mkdir k8s cd k8s Create a new file named cluster.yaml Paste the following content into cluster.yaml.
